user.name: Santiago
user.description: Computer scientist. I teach hard-core AI/ML Engineering at https://t.co/THCAAZcBMu. YouTube: https://t.co/pROi08OZYJ

fullText:
Many people want to use machine learning to solve every project they find.

This is a huge mistake.

The first rule of machine learning: Never start a project with machine learning.

Instead, start with simple heuristics: if X, then Y.

90% of the time, that’s all you need.

一款多智能体交易系统：TradingAgents，它模拟真实的交易团队，通过分析、讨论和决策，来决定是否买卖股票
